Autonomous Safe Navigation of Aerial Robots in Obstacle-Cluttered Environments

VUB ETRO and R&MM: BruBotics | Mohammad Javad Zallaghi | 2024 - 2028

Ongoing

This project focuses on developing learning-based control methods for sensor-based aerial robots that must be functional in obstacle-cluttered environments for making their navigation safe and agile.
